original_title: Hjem - Living at the End of the World
overview: What does the term "home" mean for people who find themselves confronted daily with the simultaneous harshness and beauty of life in the Arctic Circle? And what does "home" mean for us? In their documentary, the filmmakers Martina Chamrad and Christoph Kirchner seek answers in Hammerfest, Norway, the northernmost city in the world.
tagline: What does home mean to you?
title: Hjem - Living at the End of the World
